title: NO gas distribution tomorrow (9)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Litro Gas company says that there will be NO gas distribution tomorrow (9).
Accordingly, domestic LP gas cylinders of capacities 12.5 kg, 5kg & 2.3kg will not be distributed.
However, Litro Gas Lanka says that they will be resuming the distribution soon.
China willing to work with financial institutions to ease SL debt crisis
